findings.title: Gas Consumption
findings.description: The following functions can be made external instead of public to reduce gas consumption: mint(), increaseAllowance(), decreaseAllowance().

findings.title: Unused Functions
findings.description: The following functions can be omitted as they’re not used anywhere.

findings.title: Redundant Function
findings.description: The getOwner() function is redundant because it calls the owner() function which returns the owner's address as well.
